conclusion: Problem involves shadows cast by four objects with a moving light source.
Shadows depend on the position of the light source and the object.
Objects involved are a sandal, a cake, a rectangular box, and a feather.
Light source is moving backward above the objects.
Shadow of the sandal should get smaller and shift slightly away as the light source moves backward.
Shadow of the cake should get smaller and shift position as the light source moves backward.
Shadow of the rectangular box should decrease in size and move slightly as the light source moves backward.
Shadow of the feather should get smaller and shift position as the light source moves backward.
Feathers may not cast a very defined shadow.
Shapes of objects might affect the form of their shadows.
Light source initially directly above the objects.
Shadows should become smaller and shift slightly away from the original position of the light source.
